question: [Calm] Deutsch: Gib which integer bin occurs most frequently anhand des Histogramms an.

qas.question: [Calm] Deutsch: Gib which integer bin occurs most frequently anhand des Histogramms an.
[Explain] Turkce: Histograma gore how many samples were used in total belirt.
[Check] Norsk: Oppgi how many entries fall inside the modal bin basert pa histogrammet.
